products.title: Rochester, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Rochester, cream - vertical blind for a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, han
products.productdescription: For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room.Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style. Include silky bedlinens in contrasting aubergine, and an array of plush, golden-hued cushions for added pizazz!

products.title: Henderson, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Henderson, cream - vertical blind neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accen
products.productdescription: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes.For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect. Opt for plush woollen and chenille throws, in opulent gold and biscuit tones, sitting them on top of high quality bedlinen.

products.title: Richmond, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Richmond, cream - vertical blind adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet st
products.productdescription: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities.Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room. Include a dark wooden dining set and matching cream walls, and include the red in a feature wall and occasional oddments.

products.productdescription: A dark, mature cream, the ajanta (blackout) in cream is a stylish, neutral, and practical blind. White crackle patterning doesn't detract from the gentle shimmer of the fabric, and its easiness to clean and adjustable louvres make this a functional option. For freshness and vitality, with a hint of subtle sophistication, settle the cream in amongst duck egg blue units and country wooden worktops in the kitchen. Or for a luxurious yet pragmatic bathroom, pair with mocha browns and soft golds.

products.productdescription: Origin (blackout)'s spun pearl is a strong and vivid shade of grey that will work hard to offset other, brighter colours. The simple, smooth texture of the fabric creates easily movable louvres, which can be adjusted at will to allow as much or as little light in as you like. Use in a chic, contemporary home office with plenty of whites or creams, and the occasional hint of silver every now and again. Or instead, accent brightly coloured walls in the dining room by placing the spun pearl right in the middle, to create a much-needed break.

products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Tiffany, dove - vertical blind the tiffany dove is an attractive and functional blind; a soft grey-taupe shade patterned with curved, almost grass-shaped wisps. This effective filter blind will meet your needs in both the aesthetic and functionality stake
products.productdescription: The tiffany dove is an attractive and functional blind; a soft grey-taupe shade patterned with curved, almost grass-shaped wisps. This effective filter blind will meet your needs in both the aesthetic and functionality stakes. Use within a modern living room, where the walls and carpets are a soft cream, and the woods are dark brown. Otherwise, sit against taupe walls and pale green accents for an irresistible kitchen colour scheme, or to create a relaxed feel in your home office.

products.productdescription: Don't be fooled by the pale, dainty shade of the palermo (blackout) in cream, as this is a durable, sturdy blind that will last you for years. With adjustable louvres, this blind allows you to control the light easily, and you'll enjoy the way the light bounces off the sheen of the fabric. Versatile by nature, the cream will go with almost any colour scheme you have in mind, making it the perfect choice for rooms such as the bathroom or kitchen, where you can keep the overall shades the same, whilst changing out bold accents as the mood takes you.

products.productdescription: The nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic one, and the louvres are easily adjusted to allow you more or less light or privacy.Feeling bold? Hang the almond against a bold, tropical purple feature wall in the dining room, where it will provide a necessary break to a bold, albeit beautiful, shade. For the remainder of the room, turn the tables, using oatmeals as a base and purple to accent.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Deanna, soft cream - vertical blind the pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind
products.productdescription: The pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind brings class and sophistication wherever it goes. Use amidst dark chocolate and soft mocha browns in your living or dining room, or give a rustic kitchen a classy, modern twist. The soft cream will look especially stylish when coupled with taupe walls and dark woods.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), oyster - vertical blind the oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost
products.productdescription: The oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost any colour. For a country, shaker-style kitchen, sit the oyster amongst matching cream units, with wooden worktops and rustic furniture, accompanied by pretty florals and vintage-style appliances. Or treat the bathroom to a similar dcor scheme, using soft pinks and garden greens to accent this pretty louvre blind.

products.productdescription: So subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a mighty blackout blind, ideal for blocking out the outside light. For a neutral look in a home office or bedroom, team the oyster grey with taupes and soft greys, to add calm and serenity to your home. This is the model blind to use as a taming accent in an otherwise bold room that needs something soft and discreet to break it up.

products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
